subject: Ethics
title: The Universal Basic Income Debate
description: Learn The Universal Basic Income Debate in one minute.

hook.text: Finland gave 2,000 unemployed citizens free money for two years. No strings attached. What happened?

buildup.text: Universal basic income gives everyone a regular cash payment regardless of employment status.

discovery.text: Finland's recipients were happier and healthier, but didn't find jobs faster than the control group.

twist.text: Critics say UBI kills motivation. But caregivers and artists say it buys freedom to contribute differently.

climax.text: As AI displaces more jobs, UBI shifts from fringe idea to serious policy discussion worldwide.

punchline.text: If robots take the jobs, who pays the humans?

quiz.question: What did Finland's UBI experiment find?
options: Recipients were happier and healthier but didn't find jobs faster
Recipients spent all the money irresponsibly
